data.eml:eml: The genus Hebeloma in the Rocky Mountain Alpine Zone

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cripps, Cathy L., Eberhardt, Ursula, Schuetz, Nicole, Beker, Henry J., Vera S. Evenson,, Horak, Egon (2019): The genus Hebeloma in the Rocky Mountain Alpine Zone. MycoKeys 46: 1-54, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.46.32823, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.46.32823
